Sentencas: The reaction and interdiffusion characteristics at the interface of rare-earth doped ceria (M0.2Ce0.8O1.9, M = Gd, La) and perovskite-type cathode materials (La0.8Sr0.2CoO3, and La0.8Sr0.2FeO3) were investigated and their effect on the long-term reliability of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance are discussed.
Titulo: Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs

Sentencas: Secondary phase formation was observed at the ceria side of the interface by the reaction of the rare-earth component in ceria and transition metal components in perovskite.
Titulo: Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs

Sentencas: A significant diffusion of transition metals (cobalt or iron) and strontium from perovskite to ceria was observed.
Titulo: Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs

Sentencas: The iron content in perovskite and the type of rare earth in ceria strongly affect the stability of secondary phase and extent of transition metal diffusion in ceria.
Titulo: Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs

Sentencas: The bulk diffusivity was determined as a function of temperature.
Titulo: Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs

Sentencas: The iron component exhibited a fast and inhomogeneous migration in ceria, forming the iron-rich inclusions.
Titulo: Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs

Sentencas: The strontium component exhibited the tendency of the fast grain boundary diffusion in ceria.
Titulo: Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs

Sentencas: The effects of mass transport on the SOFC materials durability are discussed.
Titulo: Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs
Interface stability of perovskite cathodes and rare-earth doped ceria interlayer in SOFCs
